quotes.quote: Explore your web â€” the needs, the beliefs, the emotions that are controlling you â€¦ so there's more of you to give â€¦ and so you can appreciate what's driving other people. It's the only way our world's going to change.
We can't fully encompass our motivational and inspirational awareness without fully understanding our purpose in life.
If you don't go after what you want, you'll never have it. If you don't ask, the answer is always no. If you don't step forward, you're always in the same place.
You don't have to see the whole staircase, just take the first step.
Expect problems and eat them for breakfast.

Excellence is never an accident. It is always the result of high intention, sincere effort, and intelligent execution; it represents the wise choice of many alternatives - choice, not chance, determines your destiny.
Nothing in the world is ever completely wrong. Even a stopped clock is right twice a day.
Start by doing what's necessary; then do what's possible; and suddenly you are doing the impossible.
If you can't fly then run, if you can't run then walk, if you can't walk then crawl, but whatever you do you have to keep moving forward.
All great achievements require time.
I hope when you count the stars you begin with yourself, and may you embrace the moonlight with your dreams.

Our lives are not determined by what happens to us but by how we react to what happens, not by what life brings to us, but by the attitude we bring to life. A positive attitude causes a chain reaction of positive thoughts, events, and outcomes. It is a catalyst, a spark that creates extraordinary results.
The way to get started is to quit talking and begin doing.
The only person you are destined to become is the person you decide to be.
Often, what seems an impossible climb is just a staircase without the steps drawn in.
Do the difficult things while they are easy and do the great things while they are small. A journey of a thousand miles must begin with a single step.
Motivation is simple. Eliminate those who aren't motivated.
Our greatest glory is not in never falling, but in rising every time we fall.
What is the best thing about people doubting your potential? The pleasure of proving them wrong.
Aim for the moon. If you miss, you may hit a star.

Never give in -- never, never, never, never, in nothing great or small, large or petty, never give in except to convictions of honour and good sense. Never yield to force; never yield to the apparently overwhelming might of the enemy.
No matter how many mistakes you make or how slow you progress, you are still way ahead of everyone who isn't trying.
Optimism is the faith that leads to achievement. Nothing can be done without hope and confidence.
Don't fear failureâ€¦in great attempts it is glorious even to fail.
The ultimate inspiration is the deadline.
It does not matter how slowly you go as long as you do not stop.
With the new day comes new strength and new thoughts.
Failure will never overtake me if my determination to succeed is strong enough.
The inner thought coming from the heart represents the real motives and desires. These are the cause of action.
Nothing will ever be attempted if all possible objections must first be overcome.
